page.title: 17Tourism and Lifestyles
page.content: Witton & Ridlington is a pleasant rural & seaside area with a clean sandy beach at Walcott Gap. Tourist Amenities include a caravan park, static caravans,holiday chalets & camping site.B & B accomodation is available in a few places.Shops at Walcott Gap have longer opening hours for tourists. Cycles can be hired. {Tourist Attractions}Within easy reach are small towns at Stalham & N.Walsham Stalham has a small deadstock, furniture & garden produce market on Tuesdays & N.Walsham a fruit,veg,fish, clothes etc. market on Thursdays. Felbrigg & Blickling Hall are within \ hour drive as are the Broads at Wroxham. {Lifestyles}There is a restaurant & take-away service at Walcott Gap & a better class restaurant & hotel at Witton Old Rectory
